title: Definitions
context: [ยง344-2] Definitions. As used in this chapter unless the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;Agency&rdquo; means any department, office, board, or commission of the State or county government that is a part of the executive branch of that government. &ldquo;Environment&rdquo; means the complex of physical and biological conditions that influence human well-being, including land, air, water, minerals, flora, fauna, energy, noise, and places of historic or aesthetic significance. [L 1974, c 247, pt of ยง1] Revision Note Numeric designations deleted.
